message.content:
cs.DC, cs.NI, cs.OS, cs.AR, cs.SY

Reasoning: 
- cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing): The paper discusses the creation of a Raspberry Pi cluster for cloud computing research, which falls under this sub-category.
- cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture): The paper mentions the setup and configuration of the hardware and system software, which involves networking and internet architecture.
- cs.OS (Operating Systems): The paper discusses the system software used in the Raspberry Pi cluster, which falls under this sub-category.
- cs.AR (Hardware Architecture): The paper discusses the unique characteristics of the Raspberry Pi and how it poses challenges and opportunities for building a cluster, which falls under this sub-category.
- cs.SY (Systems and Control): The paper discusses the monitoring and maintenance of the Raspberry Pi cluster, which falls under this sub-category.
